settings.title: Welcome to Paoti
settings.text: We are a brand dedicated to crafting handmade bags that redefine elegance, style, and sophistication.

settings.text__pretitle: Custom Unique Pieces Handcrafted with Dedication
settings.text__description: The skill of our ancestral weavers and the passionate craftsmanship of our master leatherworkers define the essence of PAOTI. Every bag that emerges from our workshop is a symphony of exquisite materials and skilled hands.Our artisans seamlessly meld ancestral traditions with contemporary innovation, resulting in pieces that pay homage to our heritage while embracing a futuristic vision.

settings.about__description: Diana Barboza, the inspiring force behind PAOTI, epitomizes the ethos of our brand. An industrial engineer with a master's in Business Administration, Diana transformed a dream into reality while navigating the corporate world. To her, PAOTI signifies more than fashion; it's a call to empower women and to embrace authenticity in every facet.Elevate Your Style with PAOTIEach piece we create is a testament to luxury and sophistication, meticulously handwoven with dedication and finesse. Visit our website paotistore.com to explore our collections and immerse yourself in the handwoven elegance. Indulge in the glamour of PAOTI and discover how we can elevate your style to new heights.
